NK085(ru)005:1: // gsang ba sngags kyi dam tshig gi rim pa mdor
NK085(ru)005:2: bsdus pa chos rje gtsang ston pas mdzad pa bzhugs
NK085(ru)005:4: rang byung ye shes mtha' bral nam mkha' la //
NK085(ru)005:5: yon tan zad med yid bzhin rin chen bzhin //
NK085(ru)005:6: 'dzin pa bral ba'i thugs rje chen po yis //
NK085(ru)005:7: 'gro rnams sgrol mdzad rje btsun rnams la 'dud //
NK085(ru)005:8: spyir gsang sngags kyi dam tshig la bsam gyis mi khyab kyang mdor bsdu na don bcu ste /
NK085(ru)005:9: ngo bo dang rnam grangs dang /
NK085(ru)005:12: nyams pa'i snga rtags tshe 'di la 'byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:14: ma nyams pa'i yon tan dang /
NK085(ru)005:15: nyams na bskang ba'i thabs dang /
NK085(ru)005:17: mdo chos nyid du bsdu ba dang bcu'o //
NK085(ru)005:18: de la dang po ngo bo ni /
NK085(ru)005:19: dam tshig dpag tu med kyang rtsa ba yan lag
NK085(ru)005:20: gnyis su 'dus de la yan lag gi dam tshig
NK085(ru)005:21: kyang rtsa ba'i dam tshig bzhir 'dus /
NK085(ru)005:22: dper na 'byung bzhi nam mkha'i khong du 'dus pa dang 'dra bar /
NK085(ru)005:23: rtsa ba bzhi la sogs pa kun kyang sems nyid
NK085(ru)005:24: mnyam pa nyid chos sku'i ngang du chu nang gi
NK085(ru)005:25: zla ba ltar dbyer med par rtogs pa ni dam
NK085(ru)005:28: bsrung ba'i thabs su bshad pas 'dir ma brjod do //
NK085(ru)005:29: gsum pa bsrung ba'i thabs la /
NK085(ru)005:31: yan lag gi dam tshig gnyis so //
NK085(ru)005:32: de yang rtsa ba'i dam tshig la bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)005:33: byang chub sems dang sku gsung thugs so //
NK085(ru)005:34: byang chub sems la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)005:35: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems ni /
NK085(ru)005:36: phung po khams thams cad rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par rtogs nas /
NK085(ru)005:37: de yang sems nyid dang dbyer med pa ni /
NK085(ru)005:38: kun rdzob byang chub kyi sems so //
NK085(ru)005:39: don dam pa byang chub sems ni /
NK085(ru)005:40: snang srid kyi chos thams cad rang byung gi ye shes chos kyi skur grub par rtogs pa ni /
NK085(ru)005:41: don dam pa byang chub kyi sems so //
NK085(ru)005:42: de ltar ma rtogs shing bskur ram ma mos na nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:43: sku yi dam tshig la gnyis kyi /
NK085(ru)005:44: dang po slob dpon drug ni /
NK085(ru)005:46: skyabs 'gro thun mong ba yan chad rgyu mtshan nyid kyi chos zhus pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:47: de ni dper na spyir rgyal khrims la gnas pa'i rgyal po tsam du bkur ro //
NK085(ru)005:49: dper na rgyal bu rgyal sar bton pas drin chen gyi khur ba tsam du bkur ro //
NK085(ru)005:50: dam tshig dbog pa dang dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon ni /
NK085(ru)005:51: mas bu bskyed pa dang 'dra bar bu gcig pa'i ma tsam du bkur ro //
NK085(ru)005:52: chag nyams skong ba'i slob dpon ni /
NK085(ru)005:53: rgyal bu rgyal khrims la thugs nas phas bton pa
NK085(ru)005:54: dang 'dra bar pha bzang po tsam du bkur ro
NK085(ru)005:55: // shes rgyud grol ba'i slob dpon ni /
NK085(ru)005:56: thos pas rang rgyud bkrol ba yin te /
NK085(ru)005:57: mig gis phyi nang mthong ba dang 'dra bar mig tsam du bkur ro //
NK085(ru)005:58: man ngag gi slob dpon ni /
NK085(ru)005:59: bskyed rdzogs kyi gdams ngag dbog pa yin te /
NK085(ru)005:61: chos shes kyang 'bras bu mi thob pas snying dang
NK085(ru)005:62: 'dra ste yan lag gang gis kyang 'chi bar mi
NK085(ru)005:63: nus pas snying tsam du bkur ro //
NK085(ru)005:64: gnyis pa mched la rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)005:66: sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi rgyu yod pas spyi tshan bzang po tsam du bkur ro //
NK085(ru)005:67: ring ba'i mched ni chos sgor zhugs pa thams cad
NK085(ru)005:68: yin te nang tshan bzang po tsam du bkur ro
NK085(ru)005:70: gsang sngags kyi sgor zhugs pa thams cad yin te pha spun mthun po tsam du bkur ro //
NK085(ru)005:72: slob dpon gcig la dbang dang gdams ngag lhan gcig tu zhus pa yin te /
NK085(ru)005:73: spun mthun po tsam du bkur ro //
NK085(ru)005:74: slob dpon dang mched kyi dpe bcu po de yang
NK085(ru)005:75: 'jig rten gyi dman pa dang cha zhen pa ltar
NK085(ru)005:76: ma yin par / de bas lhag par bzang bar blta zhing bkur ro //
NK085(ru)005:77: slob dpon dag mched kyi dam tshig thun mong du bsrung ba'i thabs ni /
NK085(ru)005:78: lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas bsrung ste /
NK085(ru)005:79: lus kyi sgo nas zas dang nor longs spyod thams cad 'bul ba yang /
NK085(ru)005:81: rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus //
NK085(ru)005:82: bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig /rab tu gces dang yid 'thad 'bul //
NK085(ru)005:85: dam pa'i rigs su gyur pa na //
NK085(ru)005:86: rjes kyi rigs dang 'thad pa'i yon //
NK085(ru)005:87: nor gyi dbyigs dang na baza'i mchog /rtsi mchog 'tsho ba'i zas mchog rnams //
NK085(ru)005:88: 'bul la gsol bas mnyes par bya //
NK085(ru)005:89: des ni nad dang dbul la sogs //
NK085(ru)005:90: bkres dang tsha ba'i sdug bsngal gyis //
NK085(ru)005:93: zas nor la sogs pa thams cad kyang sbur ma ltar 'phang ba med par 'bul lo //
NK085(ru)005:94: zhabs 'bring yang gshegs bzhud la sogs pa bla ma
NK085(ru)005:95: ci ltar mnyes par ltar bran gyi tha mal ltar
NK085(ru)005:96: bya'o // ngo bo'i ma drin che ba ltar mi bsam /
NK085(ru)005:97: bla ma'i rigs dang 'khor la sogs pa kun kyang de dang mtshungs te /
NK085(ru)005:98: zas nor la sogs pa mi blang ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:100: ngag gi sgo nas bla ma dang grogs po'i skyon sba ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:102: rgyu mtshan 'di 'dra zhes tshul yang bsgrags pa ma yin na /
NK085(ru)005:103: skyon dang bskur pa la sogs pa ni 'jig rten bre mo'i gtam du yang brjod par mi bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:104: yid kyi sgo nas g.yo sgyu dang phrag dog dang /
NK085(ru)005:107: nor la barlama pa la sogs pa se gol tsam gyi yun du'ang bya ba ma yin no //
NK085(ru)005:109: chags sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang //
NK085(ru)005:110: phrag dog dug lnga'i sems mi bya //
NK085(ru)005:111: ngan du mi sems ci bar sems //
NK085(ru)005:112: pha ma yi dam 'dra bar sems //
NK085(ru)005:113: rtag tu gdung ba rgyan mi bcad //
NK085(ru)005:114: byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin //
NK085(ru)005:115: zhes gsungs pas mnyes pa'i thabs su zas nor dang lus 'bul ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:116: dad pa dang shes rab dang sgrub pa la sogs
NK085(ru)005:117: pa ci byas kyang bla ma dang grogs po mnyes
NK085(ru)005:118: par byed cing / bka'i mthil gcog pa lta ci srid /
NK085(ru)005:119: zur yang mi gcog pa'i rnal 'byor ba ni sangs
NK085(ru)005:120: rgyas kun gyi rgyun la zhugs pas 'khor bar mi
NK085(ru)005:121: ldog par rgyal ba kun tu bzang pos gsungs so
NK085(ru)005:122: // de yang dam tshig bkod pa las /
NK085(ru)005:123: dam tshig ma nyams par srung na //
NK085(ru)005:124: kun bzang nga dang skal pa mnyam //
NK085(ru)005:126: bka' bcag kyang mi sto ba'i skabs ni /
NK085(ru)005:127: gdung bar chad slob dpon gyi cha byad du byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:129: chang dang gdon dbang du song ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:130: log pa'i lam la 'god cing dge ba'i gegs byed nas sdig pa'i las la bskul ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:131: bka' bden pa mi ston cing mu stegs dang log
NK085(ru)005:132: pa'i chos ston par byed na bka' bcag pa ni
NK085(ru)005:133: mi sto ste gnas skabs bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)005:134: grogs po yang dkar po la smod cing nag po la bstod pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:135: bka' dang dam tshig la 'gal zhing mched la brtse gdung med cing 'khu ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:136: dad pa can gyi tshogs gcog cing /
NK085(ru)005:137: dge ba can gyi thugs dkrugs pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:138: chos la mi dad cing dge 'dun la mi mos na bka' bcag kyang mi sto /
NK085(ru)005:139: de bas zhib par bla ma lnga bcu la sogs gzhung gzhan du rgyas par blta'o //
NK085(ru)005:140: des sku'i dam tshig bsrung thabs so //
NK085(ru)005:141: gsung gi dam tshig la sngags gsum mu dra rnam pa bzhi ste /
NK085(ru)005:142: rgyu ma nor ba rtsa ba'i sngags yi dam lha'i snying po dang /
NK085(ru)005:143: bskyed pa rkyen gyi sngags lha'i sku bskyed pa'i sngags dang /
NK085(ru)005:144: bskul ba las kyi sngags phrin las kyi sngags thams cad do //
NK085(ru)005:145: phyag rgya rnam pa bzhi ni /
NK085(ru)005:146: sku phyag rgya chen po yi dam gyi lha bsgom pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:147: gsung chos kyi phyag rgya sngags dang bzlas brjod la sogs pa thams cad dang /
NK085(ru)005:148: thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya thugs kar bsgom pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:149: 'phro 'du phrin las kyi phyag rgya ting nge 'dzin
NK085(ru)005:150: gyi 'gro don byed pa la sogs pa thams cad
NK085(ru)005:152: snang ba thams cad sku phyag rgya chen po /
NK085(ru)005:153: de rang bzhin med pa gsung chos kyi phyag rgya /
NK085(ru)005:154: de dbyer med thugs dam tshig gi phyag rgya /
NK085(ru)005:155: de'i ngang la bya ba byed pa mi 'gags pa las kyi phyag rgya'o //
NK085(ru)005:156: de ltar rang gi lus ngag yid gsum yi dam lha'i sngags gsum dang /
NK085(ru)005:157: dbyer med pa dus gsum dang spyod lam bzhir yang
NK085(ru)005:158: dang yang du ting nge 'dzin dang sngags kyi bzlas
NK085(ru)005:160: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi gzungs kyis zin pa yin pas /
NK085(ru)005:161: byang chub kyi gzungs la zhugs ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:162: de lta bu la rab rgyun chad med pa /
NK085(ru)005:163: 'bring nyin dus drug dang mtshan dus drug dang /
NK085(ru)005:166: tha ma nyin lan gcig mtshan lan gcig la sogs
NK085(ru)005:167: par brtson 'grus bskyed de 'bad la nyams su blang
NK085(ru)005:168: ngo // gzhan yang de'i yan lag tu tshogs dang /
NK085(ru)005:169: gtor ma la sogs pa yang ci ltar 'bungs la gzhung bzhin du bagyi'o //
NK085(ru)005:170: de ltar mi byed par yal bar dor nas g.yengs
NK085(ru)005:171: ba la shor na byang chub kyi sa bon brlag
NK085(ru)005:172: pa yin no // de ni gsung gi dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)005:174: gsang ba'i man ngag gi don rnam pa bcu'o //
NK085(ru)005:175: lta ba zab mo man ngag gi don gsang ba
NK085(ru)005:176: de'i rjes su zhugs pa'i spyod pa zab mo gsang
NK085(ru)005:177: ba dang / yi dam gyi lha dang /
NK085(ru)005:179: dbang dang sgrub pa'i dus kyi gzungs ma dang /
NK085(ru)005:182: grub rtags la sogs pa ci byung ba thams cad gsang ngo //
NK085(ru)005:183: gzhan yang sgrub pa'i gnas dang /
NK085(ru)005:185: rdzas dang lag cha ci dgos thams cad shin tu gsang ngo //
NK085(ru)005:186: gzhan yang gsang bar 'os pa ni /
NK085(ru)005:187: dkon mchog la bsngosa pa'i phud dang /
NK085(ru)005:191: lha'i rten gyi phur pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:192: yang dag gi bsgrub pa la dgos pa'i rkong bu dang /
NK085(ru)005:193: bam gyi dbang po lnga dang /
NK085(ru)005:194: gsang sngags la dgos pa'i dam rdzas la sogs pa kun gsang ngo //
NK085(ru)005:195: gsang bar gnyer gtad pa ni /
NK085(ru)005:196: grogs po'i spyod pa ngan pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:198: sems can gyis ngan spyod dang /
NK085(ru)005:199: sems can la gnod pa'i spyod rigs rgya dang rnyir
NK085(ru)005:200: dang sa mda' la sogs pa thams cad ni gsang
NK085(ru)005:201: ba bla na med pa byang chub kyi rgyu yin
NK085(ru)005:202: no // gzhan yang slob dpon dang /
NK085(ru)005:203: grogs po'i gsung gsang ba thams cad kyang gsang ngo //
NK085(ru)005:204: de ltar ma gsang nas bzlas na sems can gsang sngags la mi mos te /
NK085(ru)005:205: log lta skye ste sdig che'o //
NK085(ru)005:206: de bas gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te /
NK085(ru)005:207: sems can don phyir rab tu gsang //
NK085(ru)005:208: gsang thub dngos grub mi nyams pas //
NK085(ru)005:209: gsang phyir man ngag sna tshogs gsang //
NK085(ru)005:211: gsang na dngos grub mi nyams pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:212: rang gzhan gyi don thams cad 'grub bo //
NK085(ru)005:219: de yang lus kyi sba ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:220: ngag gis rdo rje'i lce yod kyang mi brjod pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:221: sems kyis bstan par mi bsam pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:222: de lta bus shin tu gsang bar gdams pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:223: de yang sa ma ya bkod pa las //
NK085(ru)005:224: kun bzang bka' dang nges pa'i lung //
NK085(ru)005:225: gsang ba bcu po bcu po dag /man ngag gzhan la mi spel ba //
NK085(ru)005:226: de yang lus ngag sems rnams te //
NK085(ru)005:227: lus kyi spyod pa barlangasa po spang //
NK085(ru)005:228: ngag gis rdo rje'i lce yod kyang //
NK085(ru)005:229: brjod pa dag tu bya ba min //
NK085(ru)005:231: 'o na ye mi bshad dam ce na /
NK085(ru)005:233: dbang bskur gnang ba gang thob pa //
NK085(ru)005:234: snod dang ldan pa'i skyes bu la //
NK085(ru)005:235: thabs kyis smra ba gang byed pa //
NK085(ru)005:236: 'di ni bsrung ba'i rim pa ste //
NK085(ru)005:237: dngos grub 'bras bu chud mi za //
NK085(ru)005:239: de ni rtsa ba'i dam tshig gi rnam pa bzhi'o //
NK085(ru)005:240: yan lag gi dam tshig rnam pa gnyis te /
NK085(ru)005:242: khyad par la rnam pa lnga ste /
NK085(ru)005:243: spyad pa'i dam tshig lnga dang /
NK085(ru)005:244: mi spang ba'i dam tshig lnga dang /
NK085(ru)005:245: dang du blang ba'i dam tshig lnga dang /
NK085(ru)005:246: shes par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga dang /
NK085(ru)005:247: bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga'o //
NK085(ru)005:248: spyad par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga ni /
NK085(ru)005:251: ma byin par blangs ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:255: rang bzhin lta ba'i sbyor sgrol ni /
NK085(ru)005:256: snang srid kyi chos thams cad chos nyid skye ba med pa rtogs pa ni sbyor ba ste /
NK085(ru)005:257: dngos po dang mtshan mar mi gnas pas sgrol ba'o //
NK085(ru)005:258: ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor sgrol ni /
NK085(ru)005:259: de lta bu don rnams 'byor pa'i blo la sbyor tsa /
NK085(ru)005:260: rnam rtog dang dngos 'dzin mi gnas pas sgrol ba'o //
NK085(ru)005:261: dbang po yul gyi sbyor sgrol ni /
NK085(ru)005:262: phung po khams dang skye mched rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
NK085(ru)005:263: du sbyor bas 'jig rten gyi dngos 'dzin mi gnas
NK085(ru)005:265: thabs chen po'i sbyor sgrol ni /
NK085(ru)005:266: sngon dpa' chen po'i ru tra bsgral nas sems nyid zag med du sbyor ba'o //
NK085(ru)005:267: mngon phyung phrin las kyis sgrol ba ni /
NK085(ru)005:268: deng sang rnal 'byor pa lta spyod sgom gsum tshang
NK085(ru)005:269: du phyin nas yul bsgral ba'i zhing bcu la gsang
NK085(ru)005:270: sngags kyi phrin las byed nas phung po gdos po
NK085(ru)005:271: can du bsgral nas sems zag pa med pa la
NK085(ru)005:272: sbyor ba'o // de yang yul bsgral ba'i zhing bcu lta bu la byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:273: sems kyi gzhan la snying brtse ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:274: bstan pa'i ched du byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:275: dngos po ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor tshad du skyol bas byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:276: de ltar byed na sgrol ba'i dam tshig ste /
NK085(ru)005:277: de bsgral bas kho'i 'bras bu rdzogs pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:281: de ltar bsgral ba'i dgos ched kyang //
NK085(ru)005:282: lha mnyes bdag gi dam skongs shing //
NK085(ru)005:283: las ngan bar chad sdug yun thung //
NK085(ru)005:284: rang gis bsags med ngan song la //
NK085(ru)005:285: bde lam 'di las gzhan med do //
NK085(ru)005:286: thabs kyi spyod pas 'ching gyur na //
NK085(ru)005:287: byang chub sems dpa' 'dul dbang gis //
NK085(ru)005:288: rngon dang smad 'tshong ston pa'ang lhung //
NK085(ru)005:289: khe dang spyod pa de med phyir //
NK085(ru)005:290: thabs chen lam la gnas pa yi //
NK085(ru)005:291: skyes bu kun gyis bya bar 'byung //
NK085(ru)005:292: zhes gsungs pas re cha dang khe dang zas nor dang /
NK085(ru)005:293: 'dod pa'i phyir byas na nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:294: mu stegs dang phra men gyis sbyor bar mi nus so //
NK085(ru)005:295: de lta bu kun kyang rgyud lung gi don go
NK085(ru)005:296: bas ting nge 'dzin gyis nyams su len pa gal
NK085(ru)005:297: che'o // sbyor ba'i dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)005:298: dbang dang sgrub pa'i dus kyi phyag rgya lam du khyer ba'o //
NK085(ru)005:299: de yang zhen pa dang dngos 'dzin gyis byas na nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:300: rdzun du smra ba'i dam tshig la bcu bdun te /
NK085(ru)005:302: lus ngag yid gsum rang bzhin gyis ma grub par rtogs tsa /
NK085(ru)005:303: dngos po thams cad rdzun du song ba'o //
NK085(ru)005:305: yul dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:306: slob dpon dang grogs po dang /
NK085(ru)005:307: sems can thams cad gnod pa spong ba'i thabs su
NK085(ru)005:308: rdzun gyi rnam pa ci smras kyang dam tshig dang
NK085(ru)005:311: gsang ba'i man ngag rnam pa bcu la sogs pa
NK085(ru)005:312: thugs kyi dam tshig gi skabs su bshad pa thams
NK085(ru)005:313: cad dang / gsang ba'i don thams cad la gsang ba'i phyir ro //
NK085(ru)005:314: rdzun du smra ba ni rdzun du smra ba'i dam tshig ces bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:315: de ltar ma yin par gzhan gnod par smra na nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:316: ma byin pa len pa'i dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)005:317: bsgral ba'i zhing bcu la ma byin par len thabs ni tshar gcod pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:318: gzhan yang gzungs ma mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:319: b+han d+ha mtshan dang ldan pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:320: gsang sngags byin rlabs can gyi rdzas dang /
NK085(ru)005:322: de kun zhing ngan pa'i snod du 'dug na blang ngo //
NK085(ru)005:323: gzhan yang sa 'og gi gter dang /
NK085(ru)005:324: phyug po ser sna can gyi nor yang blangs bla
NK085(ru)005:325: ma dkon mchog gi phyogs su btang ngo de yang
NK085(ru)005:326: dam tshig bkod pa las ser snas bcings pa'i yo
NK085(ru)005:327: byad dang / dngos grub kyi rdzas tha mal pas
NK085(ru)005:328: 'chang pa rnam pa rnams blangs la byin rlabs kyi
NK085(ru)005:329: rten du bya ba ni dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)005:330: rang rgyal du gzhan gyi yo byad 'phrog pa ni nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:332: rang 'dod kyi ched du bya na nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:333: ngag barlangasa po'i dam tshig ni /
NK085(ru)005:334: bsgral ba'i zhing bcu la thab pa ni tshar gcod pa'i dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)005:335: slob bu'i snod bcos pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:336: gzhan dag chos la gzud pa'i slad du gshe ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:337: gsang sngags kyi bar du gcod pa'i 'byung po la
NK085(ru)005:338: phrin las byed pa ni ngag barlanga po'i dam tshig
NK085(ru)005:339: go // de lta bu'i dam tshig ni spyod pa'i dam tshig lnga'o //
NK085(ru)005:340: mi spang ba'i dam tshig la yang dag pa'i dug lnga dang /
NK085(ru)005:342: yang dag pa'i dug lnga ni /
NK085(ru)005:343: gong gi sbyor ba'i dam tshig dang /
NK085(ru)005:344: 'dod yon rang rig ye shes su shar bas mi spang ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:345: zhe sdang zhing bcu thugs rjes bsgral bas mi spang ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:346: theg pa 'og ma la mi 'thab cing nang du zhugs pa'i phrag dog dang /
NK085(ru)005:347: yang dag pa'i don rtogs pa'i nga rgyal dang /
NK085(ru)005:348: phyi nang gi chos thams cad ris su mi phyed pa'i gti mug go //
NK085(ru)005:350: nyon mongs pa'i dug lnga sems kyi chos nyid rtogs pa'i mi spong ba'o //
NK085(ru)005:351: de ltar ma byas nas rang rgyal du byas na nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:352: dang du blang ba'i dam tshig lnga ni /
NK085(ru)005:353: bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga thabs khyad par can gyis nyams su len pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:354: de ltar mi byed nas bab col du spyad na nyams pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:355: shes par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga ni /
NK085(ru)005:356: phung po lnga la sogs pa thams cad rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du rtogs nas nyams su len pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:357: bsgrub par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga ni /
NK085(ru)005:358: de lta bu'i don rtogs shing nyams su blangs pas spyod yul ye shes su ka nas dag pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:359: de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i dam tshig bsrung ba'i thabs so //
NK085(ru)005:360: thun mong gi dam tshig la gnyis te /
NK085(ru)005:361: bdag don nyi shu rtsa gcig ste /
NK085(ru)005:363: lus mdzes par byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:364: dmag dang tshong la sogs pa'i 'tshogs par 'gro ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:366: lus dag yid gsum gyi byed spyod sna tshogs kyi sems kyi khengs pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:369: bslab pa mtho dman gyi phyag len pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:371: dge ba la smod pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:372: sdig pa la bstod pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:377: rang rgyud zhe sdang che bas gshis bsgyur dka' ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:378: bla ma dang grogs po'i bka' gcog pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:379: bag med pa'i spyod pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:382: chos dang 'jig rten gyi ngo bo la dga' ba'o //
NK085(ru)005:384: pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang /
NK085(ru)005:387: bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi dang /
NK085(ru)005:388: theg pa rim pa dgu la sogs pas sems can
NK085(ru)005:389: gyi don du ji ltar 'gro bar nyams su blang
NK085(ru)005:390: ngo // de las gol ba'i mu stegs dgu dang /
NK085(ru)005:391: de la sogs te sems can gyi don du ji ltar 'gyur bar nyams su blang ngo //
NK085(ru)005:392: de ni theg pa phyi nang thun mong gi dam tshig go //
NK085(ru)005:393: de ltar rtsa ba dang yan lag gi dam tshig rnams rnal 'byor pas dran pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:394: shes bzhin ma yengs par nyams su blang bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:395: mthong lam phyin chad nas ngo bo nyid kyi rgyud la rang ldan no //
NK085(ru)005:396: rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i mthar lam pa la mthar phyin pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:397: de ni bsrungs thabs kyi rim pa'o //
NK085(ru)005:398: bzhi pa de dag gi nyams rgyu ni /
NK085(ru)005:399: mi chos blon po'i las byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:402: chos byed gzhan la zur za ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:403: khe dang dregs pa'i 'du ba bstan pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:404: zas nor la chags sems che ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:405: rang gzhan gyi phyir phyogs ris che ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:408: lta spyod snyoms las su gtong nas nga rgyal ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:409: chos la phyogs ris che ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:412: le lo che bas bsgrubs mi nus pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:414: sgro bskur la dga' ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:415: grong gi nyams len la dga' ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:416: 'khor ba'i rigs rgyud dang bsod nams 'phel na dga' ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:417: gcig pur gnas mi tshugs shing mang po 'phel na dga' ba'o //
NK085(ru)005:418: de dag ni dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu ste spang na nyams pa mi 'ong ngo //
NK085(ru)005:419: lnga pa nyams pa'i snga rtags tshe 'di la 'byung ba ni /
NK085(ru)005:420: ya nga'i 'go nad sna tshogs dang /
NK085(ru)005:421: dgra la mthu mi 'byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:422: bgegs la byin rlabs byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:423: 'khor dang longs spyod yid du 'ong ba dang bral ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:424: rang la nyes pa med par gzhan gyi khas phog pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:425: ci bsam pa'i las la 'bras bu med pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:426: yid du mi 'ong ba sna tshogs 'byung ngo //
NK085(ru)005:427: sku'i dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags su /
NK085(ru)005:428: 'jig rten 'dir yang mdze shu dang nad sna tshogs
NK085(ru)005:429: 'byung nas skye bo yongs dang nye du la sogs
NK085(ru)005:430: pa kun gyis spang nas 'grogs pa'i dbang med do
NK085(ru)005:431: / mi rnams kyi spang nas dus ma yin par 'achi'o //
NK085(ru)005:432: gsung gi dam tshig nyams pa'i snga rtags tshe 'di la 'byung ba ni /
NK085(ru)005:433: bgeg rigs stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhis glag tshol ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:434: nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis skabs tshol ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:435: ye 'grogs sum brgya drug cus bar du gcod pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:436: lkugs shing dbang po nyams nas nad sna tshogs 'byung zhing gsang ba'i bka' mi thub pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:437: bar chod kyi bgegs kyis glo bur du 'achi'o //
NK085(ru)005:438: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams pa'i snga rtags ni /
NK085(ru)005:439: tshe 'dir yang mthu dang rdzu 'phrul chung zhing smyo ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:442: dbang po'i nyams mi gsal ba'o //
NK085(ru)005:443: ces sa ma ya bkod pa las byung ngo //
NK085(ru)005:444: dam tshig nyams pa'i snga rtags tshe 'dir ma byung na /
NK085(ru)005:445: gal te nyams pa'i rtags med na //
NK085(ru)005:446: legs par snang ba mi rung ste //
NK085(ru)005:447: bde ba zad byas gtan du sdug ces so //
NK085(ru)005:448: gal te ma nyams pa la nyams pa'i rtag byung na /
NK085(ru)005:449: sngon gyi rnam smin zad gyur nas /
NK085(ru)005:450: bskang gso'i las la brtson par bya //
NK085(ru)005:451: ces gsungs pas rtson par bya /
NK085(ru)005:452: drug nyams pa'i skyon tshe phyi ma la 'byung ba ni /
NK085(ru)005:453: byang chub sems kyi dam nyams na /
NK085(ru)005:454: bskal par dge ba ci bsags kyang /
NK085(ru)005:455: gzhi rten med nas 'khor ba las thon med do //
NK085(ru)005:456: sku'i dam tshig nyams na gong du gsungs pa'i sdug
NK085(ru)005:457: bsngal rnam 'byung nas bskal pa chen po gcig tu
NK085(ru)005:458: dmyal bar skye'o // gsung gi dam tshig nyams na /
NK085(ru)005:459: gong du gsungs pa'i sdug bsngal rnams byung nas lha
NK085(ru)005:460: dang mkha' 'gro g.yel nas bskal pa chen po gnyis
NK085(ru)005:462: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams na /
NK085(ru)005:463: smyo 'bog la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal 'byung nas tshe
NK085(ru)005:464: thung bskal pa chen po gsum du dmyal bar skye'o
NK085(ru)005:465: // yan lag gi dam tshig nyams na /
NK085(ru)005:466: 'khor dang longs spyod yid du 'ong ba dang bral ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:467: dngos grub la sogs pa gtan du mi 'byung ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:468: ngan song rnam pa gsum du skye bar 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)005:469: rtsa ba dang yan lag kun nyams na /
NK085(ru)005:470: rdo rje dmyal bar skye ste sdug bsngal ni dmyal
NK085(ru)005:471: kham bco brgyad gzhan dus gcig tu bsdongs kyang rdo
NK085(ru)005:472: rje dmyal ba'i char mi phod /
NK085(ru)005:473: bskal pa chen po ther 'bum du gnas te /
NK085(ru)005:475: lcags kyi ri rab chen po tshad ldan brgya reg
NK085(ru)005:476: pa bzhin du bya reg 'jam gyi lpags pas drud
NK085(ru)005:477: nas zad na rdo rje dmyal ba'i tshe tshad do
NK085(ru)005:479: de yang 'phags pa'i thugs rje las //
NK085(ru)005:480: gol bas bsdong zla med pa ni //
NK085(ru)005:481: sangs rgyas stong gi 'od zer dang //
NK085(ru)005:482: byang chub sangs rgyas phrin las ni //
NK085(ru)005:483: rgyud du mdzad kyang phan mi 'gyur //
NK085(ru)005:484: ces gsungs pas thon shin tu daka'o //
NK085(ru)005:485: bdun pa ma nyams pa'i yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)005:486: sku'i dam tshig ma nyams na /
NK085(ru)005:487: lus la mtshan dang dpe byad kyis brgyan pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:489: gzhon shing lang tsho dar la babs pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:490: yan lag lhag chad med pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:491: dbang po nyams pa med pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:493: longs spyod dang 'byor ba 'phel ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:494: 'khor ma mo dang mkha' 'gros bka' bzhin byed pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:495: srid pa gsum du dbang bsgyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:496: mthu dang rdzu 'phrul dpag gis mi lang ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:497: man ngag gi don rtogs par 'gyur ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:498: rig 'dzin rnam pa gsum gyi dngos grub thob pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:499: kun tu bzang po dang skal pa mnyam mo gsungs so //
NK085(ru)005:500: zhes gsungs gsung gi dam tshig bsrung ba'i yon tan ni /
NK085(ru)005:501: ye shes kyi lha mnyes pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:502: des bar chad bral nas rig rgyud 'phel ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:503: byin rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pas gzhan don phrin
NK085(ru)005:504: las rnam pa bzhi thogs pa med par 'grub par
NK085(ru)005:505: 'gyur ba dang mdor na ci dang ci bsam pa'i
NK085(ru)005:506: don thams cad lhun gyis grub par 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)005:507: thugs kyi dam tshig ma nyams na /
NK085(ru)005:508: thos bsam sgom gsum mthar phyin nas skyo dub med pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:509: don de nyid kyis bskyed rdzogs kyi don mthar phyin pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:510: dgongs pa de nyid kyis mngon du gyur te /
NK085(ru)005:511: ye shes kyi lha rnams kyis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)005:512: yan lag gi dam tshig ma nyams na /
NK085(ru)005:513: theg pa'i don rtogs pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:514: dngos grub rnam gnyis grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:515: sems can gdul bya'i don rnams grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:516: lta spyod ya char ma gyur te gsang sngags nang par chud pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:517: theg pa phyi nang ma 'dres pas bka'i byin rlabs dus su 'grub pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:518: bsrung ba'i lha rnams kyis skyobs pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:519: zab mo'i chos myur du rtogs shing rnal 'byor spyod
NK085(ru)005:520: pa rlan gyis zin nas rang bzhin gyi don lhun
NK085(ru)005:523: byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa dang /
NK085(ru)005:524: gsang sngags kyi dam tshig kun kyang de ltar bsrung na yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)005:525: brgyad pa nyams na bskang ba'i thabs ni /
NK085(ru)005:526: byang chub sems kyi dam tshig nyams na /
NK085(ru)005:527: bla ma dgongs nyams dang ldan pa las dbang blangs la nyams su blang bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:529: bla ma dang grogs po gang la nyams pa de
NK085(ru)005:530: la zas nor dang bdog pa thams cad 'bul nas
NK085(ru)005:531: zhe thag pa nas bshags pa bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:532: bla mas kyang gnang bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:533: ma rnyed na de dang mnyam pa brgya la bshags par bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:534: de yang ma rnyed nas de dang mnyam pa gsum la sbyin bsregs dang /
NK085(ru)005:536: bskang ba la sogs nus tshad du bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:537: tshe gcig tu dka' ba spyod /
NK085(ru)005:539: de na dpang pos kyang tshangs pa sbyin par bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:540: tshig tu bshags don du mi bshags na mi byang bar bshad do //
NK085(ru)005:541: gsung gi dam tshig nyams na /
NK085(ru)005:543: bsgrub pa chen po gsum gyi bskang bar bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:544: thugs kyi dam tshig nyams na /
NK085(ru)005:545: thams cad sems nyid kyi rang bzhin du rtogs na skong bar 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)005:546: yan lag gi dam tshig nyams na gang nyams pa de sor chud par bya'o //
NK085(ru)005:547: gal te slob dpon dang grogs kyi bshags pa mi gnang na /
NK085(ru)005:548: gal te gus pas mi len na //
NK085(ru)005:549: gnyis ka rdo rje'i dmyal bar skye //
NK085(ru)005:551: dgu pa dpe bstan pa ni /
NK085(ru)005:552: dam tshig thams cad sa gzhi bzang po lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)005:553: bsrung thub ma thub pa'i dpe so mtshams kyi mkhar bzung ba dang /
NK085(ru)005:554: bsrung ba la yon tan 'byung ba'i dpe yid bzhin nor bu lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)005:555: chos thams cad dam tshig tu 'dus pa'i dpe nam mkha' lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)005:556: bsrung na 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad gcod pa'i dpe mtshon rnon po lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)005:557: dus gsum rgyal ba'ang dam tshig la 'byung ba'i dpe pha ma lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)005:558: bsrung na dngos grub 'byung ba'i dpe rgya mtsho'i rlabs las nor bu 'byung ba lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)005:559: khyad par du mi gsod par bag dang ldan par bsrung dgos pa'i dpe me dpung lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)005:560: bsrung na 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sel ba'i dpe rtsi sman lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)005:561: bsrung ba la legs nyes shin tu che ba'i dpe rgyal po'i khrims lta bu dang /
NK085(ru)005:562: dang po byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed nas mthar
NK085(ru)005:563: ma phyin gyi bar dam tshig ma nyams par bsrung
NK085(ru)005:564: ba'i dpe rgya mtsho nor len tshong dpon lta bu'o
NK085(ru)005:565: // bcu pa dam tshig gi mdo chos nyid du bsdu ba ni /
NK085(ru)005:566: dam tshig dam tshig ces bya ba //
NK085(ru)005:567: gud na yod pa ma yin te //
NK085(ru)005:568: rang gi sems nyid dam tshig yin //
NK085(ru)005:570: dam tshig thams cad kyi dpe rgya mtsho nang gi
NK085(ru)005:571: gza' skar dang 'dra bar sems nyid dbyer med par
NK085(ru)005:572: lhun gyis grub par rtogs na dam tshig thams cad
NK085(ru)005:573: der 'dus so // de ni chos nyid kyi srog dam tshig /dam tshig gi srog lung /
NK085(ru)005:574: lung gi srog man ngag ces gsungs so //
NK085(ru)005:575: man ngag gi srog ni bsgom pa yin te /
NK085(ru)005:576: bsgom pa'i srog ni ma yengs pa yin pas spyod lam dus rgyun chad med par bsgom na /
NK085(ru)005:577: dgongs pa klong du gyur nas mngon par sangs rgyas so //
NK085(ru)005:578: de ni mdo chos nyid du bsdu ba'o //
NK085(ru)005:579: dam tshig de rnams rgyud la ldan tshul ni /
NK085(ru)005:580: dang po rnal 'byor pa rnams kyis gnyen po'i sgo
NK085(ru)005:581: nas srung zhing ma nyams pa dang bcas pas nan
NK085(ru)005:582: tan du bya'o // sa thob nas ched byas med
NK085(ru)005:583: par bsrung ba la ngo bo nyid kyis mi lta
NK085(ru)005:584: ba ste ngo bo nyid kyis bstan no //
NK085(ru)005:585: nyams pa dang bral ba ni /
NK085(ru)005:586: rtsal chen rdzogs pa'i mthar lam bar du ngo bo nyid kyis stobs su 'gyur ro //
NK085(ru)005:587: gsang sngags dam tshig bsdus pa'i don //
NK085(ru)005:588: cung zad bris pa'i bsod nams des //
NK085(ru)005:589: rnal 'byor dam dang ldan gyur te //
NK085(ru)005:590: 'gro rnams sangs rgyas thob par shog //
